item.title: Normandy Chicken & Apple Casserole
item.description: This recipe is from Gousto and serves 2. Ingredients 5ml Chinese rice wine 11g chicken stock mix 2 ciabattas 21g wholegrain mustard 250g chicken thigh, diced 50g soft cheese 5g chives 80g fine green beans 2 garlic cloves 1 brown onion 1 apple 1tsp flour olive oil salt and pepper Method Preheat the oven to 220°C / 200°C fan / gas 7 Boil half a kettle Heat a large, wide-based, hob-safe oven-proof casserole dish with a drizzle of olive oil over a medium-high heat Chop the apple into wedges and remove the core
